features.name: Marketo Connector Configuration
features.description: Configure and validate Marketo Munchkin account ID for website tracking integration
test_scenarios: Configure valid Marketo account ID
Validate account ID against Marketo servers
Save encrypted account ID to portal settings
Clear/remove existing account ID configuration
Test with invalid account ID and verify error message
Verify configuration persists across sessions
Test configuration in multi-portal environment

features.name: Marketo JavaScript Tracking Injection
features.description: Automatically inject Marketo Munchkin tracking JavaScript into all website pages
features.ui_location: Automatic - injected into all pages when configured
test_scenarios: Verify Munchkin script injection on standard pages
Verify script not injected when account ID not configured
Test script injection on different page types (CDefault pages)
Verify script uses correct account ID from settings
Test script injection with special characters in account ID
Verify no injection during installation/upgrade
Test error handling when page context is unavailable

features.name: Marketo Forms Module Display
features.description: Display Marketo forms on website pages with customizable header and footer markup
test_scenarios: Display configured Marketo form on page
Verify form loads with correct Marketo URL, code, and ID
Test form with header markup display
Test form with footer markup display
Verify form doesn't display when not configured
Test multiple Marketo forms on same page
Verify form placeholder div is created correctly

features.name: Marketo Forms Settings Management
features.description: Configure individual Marketo form instances with script processing and validation
features.ui_location: Module Actions > Settings (on Marketo Forms module)
test_scenarios: Process Marketo embed script to extract URL, code, and form ID
Save form configuration settings
Load existing form settings
Validate form configuration with live Marketo API
Test script processing with invalid format
Configure header markup HTML
Configure footer markup HTML
Test settings persistence across module copies

features.name: Form Submission Success Behavior
features.description: Configure custom behaviors after successful Marketo form submission
features.ui_location: Module Actions > Settings > Override On Success dropdown
test_scenarios: Configure default behavior (Marketo's configured follow-up URL)
Configure redirect to specific URL after submission
Configure redirect to internal page (by page ID)
Configure custom thank you message display
Test form submission with redirect behavior
Test form submission with custom message
Verify form clearing after successful submission
Test URL validation for redirect option
Test custom message with HTML content

features.name: Marketo Forms Script Validation
features.description: Real-time validation of Marketo form configuration using Forms 2.0 API
features.ui_location: Module Actions > Settings > Process Script button
test_scenarios: Validate correct Marketo script loads Forms 2.0 library
Test validation with invalid Marketo URL
Test validation with invalid form code
Test validation with invalid form ID
Verify error messages for invalid configurations
Test script loading timeout handling
Verify Update button disabled during validation
Test validation with network errors

features.name: Web.config HTTP Module Registration
features.description: Automatic registration and cleanup of Marketo HTTP module in web.config
test_scenarios: Verify HTTP module registration on install (system.web/httpModules)
Verify HTTP module registration on install (system.webServer/modules)
Test HTTP module removal on uninstall
Verify no duplicate registrations on reinstall
Test installation with existing web.config modifications
